title: FS: Three SGC Graded T206s: Chase, more
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Three SGC Graded T206s: Chase, more
posts.post_content:
Remaining three cards moved to eBay.

AVAILABLE
Hal Chase (Throwing, Dark Cap) (P350): SGC30 - $40 ([URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100101/085/web.jpg"]Image[/URL])

The addiction continues.............pm sent.

Payment sent

Rawn
Although I already have enough copies of the card and don't need another, I love the huge upper border on the Tris Speaker card!  It almost looks like an E card....
Payment sent for the Persons. Thanks, Bill
Pm sent for the Raymond. Thanks
my one and only courtesy bump before ebay on Sunday.

Card arrived today, #59 I think.

Thanks, Rawn
